DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether D-fagomine affect glycaemic response sucrose ( commercial white sugar ) quantify response
DOC.brief_title: Effects Added D-fagomine Glycaemic Responses Sucrose
DOC.detailed_description: This two treatment randomize double-blind crossover study , test product replicate twice . Randomization : Subjects randomize Williams Latin square design balance treatment order . Washout : 2 day ( may return day 3 ) Run-in : High carbohydrate diet guidance ( > 150 g/d ) 1 day treatment , recommend size dinner previous night ( food record collection require ) Drop-outs : Subjects drop visit 2 replace another subject randomize place ( new subject complete treatment ) Subjects report overnight ( 12 hour ) fast baseline sample collection , consume test product fast state .
DOC.criteria: Male female ( le 40 % Male ) Aged 18 55 year Have body mass index 18.5 29.99 kg/m2 Healthy , nondiabetic , gastric bypass surgery Have fast plasma glucose ( fingerstick ) < 100 mg/dl ( < 5.5 mmol/L ) Willing able provide write informed consent Smokers Allergic dairy soy
